Tickborne Relapsing Fever (Tests for Borrelia hermsii/miyamotoi/parkerii/turicatae Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    82475-5 Borrelia miyamotoi glpQ gene [Presence] in Blood by NAA with non-probe detection
    82476-3 Borrelia miyamotoi glpQ gene [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with non-probe detection
    82781-6 Borrelia miyamotoi flaB gene [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
